instruction: Generate some lyrics for a pop song about summer love.
output:
Verse 1:
Laying out in the sun all day, only you and me
Stuck in a summer love that's here to stay
Dreaming of days gone by, long days in the sand
Wrapped up in your embrace, with your loving hand

Chorus:
This summer love is all we'll ever need
Like the warmth of a fire burning endlessly
We'll keep it safe in our hearts until it's time to part
Summer love, forever in our hearts

Verse 2:
The sun setting in the sky, giving us one last view
As we take in this moment without any worry
Every star in the night highlighting love we've made
From this moment on, it'll never fade

Chorus:
This summer love is all we'll ever need
Like the warmth of a fire burning endlessly
We'll keep it safe in our hearts until it's time to part
Summer love, forever in our hearts
